alert.note: Alert for Halifax (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 11:23PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Halifax County through 1215 AM EDT... At 1123 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near South Boston, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... South Boston... Halifax... Turbeville... Hitesburg... Cluster Springs... Alton... and Virgilina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
